turns.speaker: AI
turns.transcript: The air thickened with the scent of damp earth as shadows shifted beneath the gnarled trees, their twisted branches clawing at a sky choked with ash. "What you bought was nothing but a curse," murmured a voice from the darkness, its owner obscured by the veil of night. A chilling breeze swept through the clearing, and the whispers of the forest seemed to beckon, urging one of them to step forward and confront the unknown.
